body_html:
Note that there a couple tests that specify FloatTensor to ensure we don't have single-precision bugs.

@gchanan - Thanks for migrating this. In variable(1), how can we set the underlying data type to be double vs float? Do we have something like a dtype argument?
body_text:
Note that there a couple tests that specify FloatTensor to ensure we don't have single-precision bugs.

@gchanan - Thanks for migrating this. In variable(1), how can we set the underlying data type to be double vs float? Do we have something like a dtype argument?
body:
> Note that there a couple tests that specify FloatTensor to ensure we don't have single-precision bugs.

@gchanan - Thanks for migrating this. In `variable(1)`, how can we set the underlying data type to be double vs float? Do we have something like a `dtype` argument?
